body:
Does the following work?

``` c++
typedef typename UntypedCall<Service>::Tag Tag;
```

...and then can you revert the next three lines? (I don't have a copy of GCC 4.8.2 handy to test this.)
body_html:
Does the following work?

typedef typename UntypedCall<Service>::Tag Tag;

...and then can you revert the next three lines? (I don't have a copy of GCC 4.8.2 handy to test this.)
